text: Isolation of mRNA and real-time PCR

Total cellular RNA was extracted from PB <extra_id_0> CD4 <extra_id_2> Protein <extra_id_1> + T cells using an RNA isolation kit ( RNeasy Mini kit ; Qiagen , Valencia , CA , USA ) , according to the manufacturer 's instructions .
cDNA was synthesized from total RNA with Molony murine leukemia virus reverse transcriptase ( US Biochemical , Cleveland , OH , USA ) and oligo - ( dT ) 15 primers ( Promega , Madison , WI , USA ) .
Real-time PCR was performed with the LightCycler Instrument ( Roche Diagnostics , Penzberg , Germany ) in glass capillaries .

The reaction mix containing <extra_id_0> Taq <extra_id_2> Protein <extra_id_1> DNA polymerase and DNA double-strand - specific SYBR Green I dye ( Lightcycler FastStart DNA Master SYBR Green I ; Roche Diagnostics ) and specific primers were added to cDNA dilutions .

The cDNA samples were denatured at 95degrees C for 10 min , and were then amplified for 40-50 cycles : at 95degrees C ( 10 s ) , at 65degrees C ( 15 s ) , and 72degrees C ( 22 s ) for <extra_id_0> beta-actin <extra_id_2> Protein <extra_id_1> ; at 95degrees C ( 10 s ) , at 62degrees C ( 15 s ) , and at 72degrees C ( 10 s ) for <extra_id_0> SOCS1 <extra_id_2> Protein <extra_id_1> ; and at 96degrees C ( 10 s ) , at 68degrees C ( 15 s ) , and at 72degrees C ( 15 s ) for <extra_id_0> SOCS3 <extra_id_2> Protein <extra_id_1> .
Amplification curves of the fluorescence values versus cycle number were obtained , and a melting curve analysis was then performed .

The levels of <extra_id_0> SOCS1 <extra_id_2> Protein <extra_id_1> and <extra_id_0> SOCS3 <extra_id_2> Protein <extra_id_1> expression were determined by normalizing relative to <extra_id_0> beta-actin <extra_id_2> Protein <extra_id_1> expression .

The forward and reverse primers were as follows : for <extra_id_0> beta-actin <extra_id_2> Protein <extra_id_1> , 5'-GTGGGGCGCCCCAGGCACCA-3 ' and 5'-CTCCTTAATGTCACGCACGATTTC-3 ' ; for <extra_id_0> SOCS1 <extra_id_2> Protein <extra_id_1> , 5'-AGACCCCTTCTCACCTCTTG-3 ' and 5'-GCACAGCAGAAAAATAAAGC-3 ' ; and for <extra_id_0> SOCS3 <extra_id_2> Protein <extra_id_1> , 5'-CCCGCCGGCACCTTTCTG-3 ' and 5'-AGGGGCCGGCTCAACACC-3 ' .
